modName: HD Jack of Blades Armour - Standalone
summary: Standalone version of BurntBiscuit's HD Jack of Blades Nightingale Armour Retexture
descriptionHtml:
Standalone version of BurntBiscuit's HD Jack of Blades Nightingale Armour Retexture.

Now you can run around as your favourite Fable antagonist!

You can create the armour under the daedric section or you can add it by opening the console (press tilde key ~), entering "help jack" (this will list the ID's for the different pieces of Jack of Blades armour) then "player.additem <whatever ID> 1"

All credit for textures goes to BurntBiscuit

If you prefer an evil trio of Jack of Blades Nightingales then just download the original Nightingale retexture here:
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=1479
author: BurntBiscuit and Tyf-E
